abstract: Beer companies are rethinking the fraternity house imagery and sophomoric humor that long defined their advertising campaigns.

abstract: Fiat Chrysler is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers because the vehicle might fall off the jack when a tire is being changed.
snippet: Fiat Chrysler is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers because the vehicle might fall off the jack when a tire is being changed.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers, including about 442,000 in the United States, because the vehicle might fall off the jack when a tire is being changed, the automaker said Wednesday. The problem is that the part of the vehicle’s body the jack is holding up could flex, allowing the vehicle to topple, said Eric Mayne, a Fiat Chrysler spokesman. Fiat Chrysler will supply owners with wheel chocks; the owner’s manual shows how they should be used. The automaker said it was aware of three minor injuries.

headline.main: Dodge Chargers Recalled for Tire Jack Problem

lead_paragraph: SPECIAL POST — For Rachel Abbe, a high school senior from Westchester, N.Y., the ticket to relief from the intense pressure of college preparation and midterm exams lay in a stack of blank New York Times crosswords on a stand near the school librarian’s desk. Moments when she did not have to focus on vocabulary words she’d never seen or drill math problems were precious and few, but just a few feet away sat a chance to take a break and do something productive at the same time. Eventually, taking that deep dive into the hobby of crossword solving affected her so much that she wrote her college application essay — a prime piece of mental real estate for any college-bound teenager — on why she solves.

abstract: Both cases highlight just how hard it is to convict those involved in complex corporate decisions where there is diffuse responsibility.
snippet: Both cases highlight just how hard it is to convict those involved in complex corporate decisions where there is diffuse responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The explosion of the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig in the Gulf of Mexico in 2010 and the demise of venerable New York law firm Dewey & Leboeuf in 2012 could not be more different. One causing widespread pollution along with 11 deaths, while the other involved questionable accounting to keep the firm afloat as it struggled to deal with a changing marketplace.

headline.main: Deepwater Horizon and Dewey & Leboeuf Cases Share Challenges

abstract: Many investors plan in advance on how they will handle risk, but when they face the real thing they tend to react differently.

lead_paragraph: I ski the backcountry a lot, so I pay close attention to reports of avalanches. In particular, I pay attention when a skier is caught and killed by one. This year alone there have been 20 avalanche fatalities in the United States. In January, there were nine fatalities in nine days.

headline.main: Make a Plan on How to Handle Risk, Then Stick to It

snippet: The funds declared legal war on Argentina 12 years ago, refusing to partake in the country’s restructurings after it defaulted on $100 billion of debt in 2001.
